data.text: Magi e ngeche mamoko mag Solomon, mane jo-Hezekia ruodh Juda ondiko.
Wamiyo Nyasaye duongʼ kuom gik ma opando;
Mana kaka polo bor kendo piny tut,
Ka ogol chilo kuom fedha,
ka ogol ngʼat marach e nyim ruoth,
Kik imiri duongʼ iwuon e nyim ruoth,
nimar ber moloyo owachni niya, “Bi ka,”
Gima wangʼi oseneno kik ikel mapiyo kirikni e nyim od bura;
Ka iloso wach manie kindi gi jabuti,
nono to ngʼat moro mowinji biro keti e wichkuot;
Wach mowach e kinde mowinjore,
Mana kaka tere mar dhahabu kata tigo mar dhahabu maber
Mana kaka ngʼich mar pe e kinde mar keyo,
Kaka boche polo gi yamo maonge koth,
Horuok mos nyalo loko chuny ruoth,
Ka iyudo mor kich, to cham mana moromo,
Kik iter tiendi pile e od jabuti,
Mana kaka arungu kata ligangla; kata asere mabith,
Mana kaka lak marach kata tielo mongʼol
Mana ka ngʼat ma lonyo law midongʼ duk e ndalo ngʼich,
Ka jasiki odenyo, to miye chiemo ocham;
Ka itimo kamano, ibiro choko chuk mach maliel e wiye,
Kaka yamb nyandwat kelo koth,
Ber dak e kona mar wi ot
Mana kaka pi mangʼich chalo ne chuny mool,
Mana kaka soko motimo chwodho kata aora moduwore chalo
Ok ber chamo mor kich mathoth,
Mana kaka dala maduongʼ ma ohingane omukore mogore piny
